parameters.name: CommandContent
parameters.description: >  This parameter is no longer used and does not take effect.

parameters.name: CommandId
parameters.description: The command ID. You can call the [DescribeCommands](~~64843~~) operation to query all available command IDs.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The command description. The description supports all character sets and can be up to 512 characters in length.

parameters.name: Launcher
parameters.description: The launcher for script execution. The value cannot exceed 1 KB in length.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The command name. The name supports all character sets and can be up to 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the command. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: The maximum timeout period for the command to be run on the instance. Unit: seconds. When a command cannot run within the specified time range, the command times out. Then, the command process is forcibly terminated by canceling the process ID (PID) of the command.

parameters.name: WorkingDir
parameters.description: The working directory of the command. The value can be up to 200 characters in length.
